component.name: Chromium

description.p: Chromium is an open-source browser that aims to build a safer, faster, and more stable way to experience the web. We invite you to join us in our effort to build a powerful platform for developing a new generation of web applications.
Chromium does not include the non-free AAC, H.264, MP3 or Adobe Flash code that is found in Chrome, although it does support Vorbis, Theora, WebM and HTML5 audio and video standards.
